videos.tag: filterDiv addiction redemption evangelism trinidad show
videos.name: Hopeless Evangelist
videos.description: Ashmir Mohammad grew up in a Muslim family in Trinidad, and as a young man turned to drugs and alcohol. But that isn’t the end of the story.

videos.name: Creative Servant
videos.description: Felisha grew up in a family that was often full of fear, sadness and brokenness. But school changed the trajectory of her life.

videos.name: Simple Service
videos.description: Reeanna is a young woman in Trinidad who lives a humble life of devotion to the Lord and service to others. She endured depression and lack of purpose before salvation.

videos.tag: filterDiv addiction redemption service evangelism trinidad show
videos.name: Homecoming
videos.description: Lennox Boodram, who grew up as a pastor’s kid in Trinidad. But as a young adult drugs took over his life.

videos.tag: filterDiv addiction redemption evangelism trinidad show
videos.name: Free Indeed
videos.description: Naz was an alcoholic living in Trinidad. He had heard about Jesus as a kid but didn’t have anyone to guide him.

videos.name: My List
videos.description: Like many others do as a teenager, Carol made a list of all the character qualities she wanted in a husband. She was shocked when she realized that she herself didn't have many of the qualities herself.

videos.name: Transformada en un Taxi
videos.description: Born into a dysfunctional family, rejected by her biological father, abused by her stepfather, and eventually thrown out of the house by her mother, Elvira Cuevas Bolívar began life headed in the wrong direction.

videos.tag: filterDiv missionary addiction redemption peru show
videos.name: Soldier For Christ
videos.description: Simmons. Jorge Quintana is a soldier of Jesus Christ fighting for the souls of men in the trenches of Peru. Years of hard work left him with everything he could have wanted; except joy.

videos.tag: filterDiv education evangelism service redemption peru show
videos.name: Looking For Answers
videos.description: Storyteller Josh Hart shares the journey of Darwin and Azucena Diaz, a newly-wed couple whose faith and passion for the Lord are a constant inspiration for others.

videos.tag: filterDiv education evangelism service redemption peru show
videos.name: A Life of Mediocrity to a Life of Ministry
videos.description: Battling with the idea of following in his father’s footsteps, Lucho neglected the idea of ever becoming a pastor. However, that all changed when God changed his heart and ignited a passion for sharing the Gospel.

videos.tag: filterDiv education missionary service redemption peru show
videos.name: A Change of Heart
videos.description: As a student at La Molina Christian school in Lima, Peru, Sara Lu saw Christianity as just a bunch of rules, and openly rebelled against them.

videos.tag: filterDiv evangelism service redemption peru show
videos.name: A New Creation
videos.description: Marlen has known pain and suffering but is using that to help other woman who were in her situation. Growing up in an abusive home, she left to pursue a career.

videos.name: Every Good Gift
videos.description: As a young student at the top of her class, it seemed as if nothing could stop Maricielo. Then she became pregnant at just 16 years old.

videos.tag: filterDiv education missionary redemption togo show
videos.name: KONDO
videos.description: Storyteller Keziah Khoo produced this story of Kondo - a Togolese teenager who did not have an easy childhood.
